bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.01.1

dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca

STEM:dhṛtarāṣṭravac
INFL:dhṛtarāṣṭrauvāca
GRAM:Nom|s|mPerf|3|s

VOCABULARY:

  • dhṛtarāṣṭra - _
  • vac - to speak; to say; to tell; to declare; to proclaim; to recite; verk￼nden

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.01.2

dharmakṣetre kurukṣetre samavetā yuyutsavaḥ

STEM:dharmakṣetrakurukṣetrasamaveyuyutsu
INFL:__kurukṣetresamavetāyuyutsavaḥ
GRAM:Comp.Loc|s|nLoc|s|nNom|p|m|PPPNom|p|m

VOCABULARY:

  • dharma - that which is established or firm; steadfast decree; statute; ordinance; law; usage; practice; customary observance or prescribed conduct; duty; right; justice (often as a synonym of punishment); virtue; morality; religion; religious merit; Law or Justice personified (as Indra); the law or doctrine of Buddhism; the ethical precepts of Buddhism (or the principal dharma called sūsra); the law of Northern Buddhism (in 9 canonical scriptures); nature; character; peculiar condition or essential quality; property; mark; peculiarity; a particular ceremony; sacrifice; the ninth mansion; an Upanishad; associating with the virtuous; religious abstraction; devotion; a bow; a Soma-drinker; name of the 15th Arhat of the present Avasarpiṇī; name of a son of Anu and father of Ghṛta; name of a son of Gāndhāra and father of Dhṛta; name of a son of Haihaya and father of Netra; name of a son of Pṛthuśravas and of Uśanas; name of a son of Suvrata; name of a son of Dīrghatapas; name of a king of Kaśmīra; name of
  • kṣetra - landed property; land; soil; name of a kind of tutelary deity; a Buddha; a field; place; region; a house; a town; department; place of origin; a sacred spot; place of pilgrimage; portion of space; (in geom.) a plane figure enclosed by lines; a diagram; a planetary orbit; a zodiacal sign; an astrological mansion; (in chiromancy) certain portions marked out on the palm; the fertile womb; wife; the body; (in Sāṃkhya) = avyakta; [alchemy] cmp. kṣetrīkaraṇa
  • kurukṣetra - name of an extensive plain near Delhi; the scene of the great battles between the Kurus and a famous place of pilgrimage; the inhabitants of that country (renowned for their bravery)
  • samave - samava; to come or meet or mix or assemble together; to be united in (acc.); to regard; to consider (with iva); to know
  • yuyutsu - wishing to fight; eager for battle; pugnacious

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.01.3

māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāścaiva kimakurvata saṃjaya

STEM:māmakapāṇḍavacaevakakṛsaṃjaya
INFL:māmakāḥ_____saṃjaya
GRAM:Nom|p|mNom|p|mAcc|s|nImpf|3|pVoc|s|m

VOCABULARY:

  • māmaka - mine
  • pāṇḍava - a son or descendant of Pāṇḍu; the 5 reputed sons of Pāṇḍu (pl.); name of a mountain; name of a country
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • eva - _
  • ka - who?; what?
  • kṛ - to make like or similar; to consider equivalent; to reduce anything to; to cause to become; to do; to accomplish; to prepare; to make use of; to compose; to act; das Nachdenken hinrichten
  • saṃjaya - conquest; victory; a kind of military array; name of a chief of the Yakṣas; name of a Sūta; the son of Gavalgaṇa and follower of Dhṛtarāṣṭra; name of a son of Dhṛtarāṣṭra; name of a son of Supārśva; name of a son of Prati or Pratikṣatra; name of a son of Bharmyāśva; name of a son of Raṇaṃjaya; name of a Vyāsa; name of a preceptor; name of a son of Kolāhala; name of a son of Kīrti

INFL:dṛṣṭvātu__vyūḍhaṃ__

VOCABULARY:

  • tu - do; now; then; but; and; or; name of the river Śatadru
  • pāṇḍava - a son or descendant of Pāṇḍu; the 5 reputed sons of Pāṇḍu (pl.); name of a mountain; name of a country
  • anīka - face; appearance; splendour; edge; point; front; row; array; march; army; forces; war; combat
  • vyūh - 1.P.; vi; to push or move apart; to place asunder; to divide; to distribute; to arrange; to place in order; to draw up in battle-array; to shift; to transpose; to alter; to separate; to resolve (vowels); [alchemy]
  • duryodhana - _
  • tadā - at that time; then; in that case (often used redundantly)

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.02.3

ācāryamupasaṃgamya rājā vacanamabravīt

STEM:ācāryaupasaṃgamrājanvacanabrū
INFL:__rājā__
GRAM:Acc|s|mAbs.Nom|s|mAcc|s|nImpf|3|s

VOCABULARY:

  • ācārya - _
  • upasaṃgam - 1.P.; upasam; to approach together; to join in approaching; to unite; to join; to go or come near; to enter into any condition or state
  • rājan - a king; sovereign; prince; chief (often applied to gods); a man of the royal tribe or the military caste; a Kṣatriya; a Yakṣa; name of one of the 18 attendants on Sūrya (identified with a form of Guha); [min.] = rājāvarta
  • vacana - the act of speaking; utterance; pronunciation; statement; declaration; express mention; speech; sentence; word; (in gram.) the injunction of a teacher; rule; advice; instruction; direction; order; command; sound; voice; (in gram.) number; rumour; dry ginger
  • brū - to speak; to say; to tell; to speak about any person or thing (acc. with or without prati); to proclaim; to answer (either intrans. with punar or trans. with praśnam); to speak or decide or judge wrongly; to call or profess one's self to be; to designate for one's self; to choose; to be told by itself

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.03.1

paśyaitāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāmācārya mahatīṃ camūm

STEM:paśetadpāṇḍuputraācāryamahatcamū
INFL:_____mahatīṃcamūm
GRAM:Imp|2|sAcc|s|fComp.Gen|p|mVoc|s|mAcc|s|fAcc|s|f

VOCABULARY:

  • paś - to see; to see with the spiritual eye; to compose; to consider; to examine; to foresee
  • etad - this; [gramm.] the pronoun etad; auf diese Weise
  • pāṇḍu - name of a people in Madhyadeśa; name of a Nāgarāja; name of an attendant of Shiva; jaundice; pale colour; Trichosanthes Dioeca; a species of shrub; name of a son of Vyāsa; husband of Kuntī and Mādrī; father of the Pāṇḍavas; [rel.] name of Śiva
  • putra - a son; child; a species of small venomous animal; (in astrol.) name of the fifth house; name of a son of Brahmiṣṭha; name of a son of Manu; a Bodhisattva; [gramm.] the word 'putra'
  • ācārya - _
  • mahat - great; large; big; huge; ample; extensive; long; abundant; numerous; considerable; important; high; eminent; abounding on rich in (instr.); distinguished by; early (morning); advanced (afternoon); violent (pain or emotion); thick (as darkness); gross; loud (as noise); many (people)
  • camū - a vessel or part (two or more in number) of the reservoir into which the Soma is poured; a kind of military unit

VOCABULARY:

  • atra - in this matter; in this respect; in this place; here at this time; there; then

  • bhīma - Rumex Vesicarius; name of Rudra-Śiva; name of one of the 8 forms of Śiva; name of one of the 11 Rudras; name of a Devagandharva; one of the Devas called Yājñamuṣ; name of a Dānava; name of a Vidyādhara; name of a son of the Rākṣasa; name of the second son of Bhīmasena and Vṛkodara; name of several other men; the race of Bhīma; name of Bhīmasena; name of a king of Vidarbha; father of Damayantī
  • arjuna - a peacock; cutaneous disease; Terminalia arjuna Bedd.; name of a man; name of Indra (who was a son of Kṛtavīrya who was slain by Paraśurāma); name of a Śāskya (known as a mathematician); name of different other persons; the only son of his mother; the descendants of Arjuna; Pentaptera arjuna Roxb.
  • sama - even; flat; level; parallel; same; similar; like; equivalent; fair; constant; ordinary; common; good; upright; easy; whole
  • yudh - war; fight; combat; struggle; contest

  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • drupada - name of a king of the Pañcālas; son of Pṛṣata; father of Dhṛṣṭadyumna; Śikhaṇḍin; and Draupadī
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • mahat - great; large; big; huge; ample; extensive; long; abundant; numerous; considerable; important; high; eminent; abounding on rich in (instr.); distinguished by; early (morning); advanced (afternoon); violent (pain or emotion); thick (as darkness); gross; loud (as noise); many (people)

  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • vīryavat - heroic; manly; possessed of strength

  • sainya - a body of troops; army; a camp
  • saṃjñā - agreement; mutual understanding; harmony; consciousness; clear knowledge or understanding or notion or conception; a sign; token; signal; gesture; direction; a track; footstep; a name; appellation; title; technical term; (in gramm.) the name of anything thought of as standing by itself; any noun having a special meaning (saṃjñāyām therefore denotes "[used] in some peculiar sense rather than in its strictly etymological meaning"); a technical expression in grammar; (with Buddhists) perception (one of the 5 Skandhas); name of the Gāyatrī; name of a particular high number; name of a daughter of Tvaṣṭṛ or Viśvakarman
  • artha - aim; purpose; cause; motive; reason; advantage; use; utility (generally named with kāma and dharma); thing; object (said of the membrum virile); object of the senses; the number five; substance; wealth; property; opulence; money; (in astron.) name of the second mansion; the mansion of wealth; affair; concern; (in law) lawsuit; action; having to do with (instr.); wanting; needing anything (instr.)
  • tad - this; gleicher

  • tvad - you

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.09.1

  • anya - other; another
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as

  • artha - aim; purpose; cause; motive; reason; advantage; use; utility (generally named with kāma and dharma); thing; object (said of the membrum virile); object of the senses; the number five; substance; wealth; property; opulence; money; (in astron.) name of the second mansion; the mansion of wealth; affair; concern; (in law) lawsuit; action; having to do with (instr.); wanting; needing anything (instr.)
  • tyaj - to leave; to abandon; to quit; to leave a place; to go away from; to let go; to dismiss; to discharge; to give up; to surrender; to resign; to part from; to renounce; to shun; to avoid; to get rid of; to free one's self from (any passion etc.); to give away; to distribute; to offer (as a sacrifice or oblation to a deity); to set aside; to leave unnoticed; to disregard; to except
  • jīvita - a living being; life; duration of life; livelihood

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.09.2

nānāśastrapraharaṇāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ

GRAM:Comp.Nom|p|mNom|p|mComp.Nom|p|m

VOCABULARY:

  • nānā - differently; variously; distinctly; separately
  • śastra - an instrument for cutting or wounding; knife; sword; dagger; any weapon (even applied to an arrow); any instrument or tool; iron; steel; a razor; [min.] = tīkṣṇaloha
  • praharaṇa - striking; beating; pecking; throwing (of grass into the fire); removing; dispelling; a weapon; a carriage-box
  • sarva - whole; entire; all; every; of all sorts; manifold; various; different; completely
  • yuddha - fight; war; (in astron.) opposition; conflict of the planets; battle
  • viśārada - experienced; skilled or proficient in; conversant with; learned; wise; clever (as a speech); name of a clear or serene mind; famous; celebrated; beautifully autumnal; lacking the gift of speech; bold; impudent

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.10.1

aparyāptaṃ tadasmākaṃ balaṃ bhīṣmābhirakṣitam

STEM:aparyāptatadmadbalabhīṣmaabhirakṣ
INFL:aparyāptaṃ__balaṃ__
GRAM:Nom|s|nNom|s|nGen|p|?Nom|s|nComp.Nom|s|n|PPP

VOCABULARY:

  • aparyāpta - incomplete; unable; incompetent; insufficient; not enough; unlimited; unbounded
  • tad - this; gleicher
  • mad - I; we
  • bala - power; strength; might; vigour; force; expertness in; stoutness; troops; an army; semen; = Balarāma; [min.] bronze; name of Śiva
  • bhīṣma - #NAME?; death; name of Śiva; a Rākṣasa; name of a son of Sāṃtanu and Gaṅgā; the race or followers of Bhīshma
  • abhirakṣ - 1.P.; abhi; to guard; to protect; to preserve

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.10.2

paryāptaṃ tvidameteṣāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam

STEM:paryāptuidametadbalabhīmaabhirakṣ
INFL:paryāptaṃ___balaṃ__
GRAM:Nom|s|n|PPPNom|s|nGen|p|mNom|s|nComp.Nom|s|n|PPP

VOCABULARY:

  • paryāp - 5.P.; pari; to reach; to obtain; to attain; to gain; to make an end of; to be content
  • tu - do; now; then; but; and; or; name of the river Śatadru
  • idam - this; (near deictic pronoun in Vedic)
  • etad - this; [gramm.] the pronoun etad; auf diese Weise
  • bala - power; strength; might; vigour; force; expertness in; stoutness; troops; an army; semen; = Balarāma; [min.] bronze; name of Śiva
  • bhīma - Rumex Vesicarius; name of Rudra-Śiva; name of one of the 8 forms of Śiva; name of one of the 11 Rudras; name of a Devagandharva; one of the Devas called Yājñamuṣ; name of a Dānava; name of a Vidyādhara; name of a son of the Rākṣasa; name of the second son of Bhīmasena and Vṛkodara; name of several other men; the race of Bhīma; name of Bhīmasena; name of a king of Vidarbha; father of Damayantī
  • abhirakṣ - 1.P.; abhi; to guard; to protect; to preserve

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.11.1

ayaneṣu ca sarveṣu yathābhāgamavasthitāḥ

STEM:ayanacasarvayathābhāgamavasthā
INFL:ayaneṣucasarveṣu__
GRAM:Loc|p|nLoc|p|nNom|p|m|PPP

VOCABULARY:

  • ayana - walking; (in astron.) advancing; precession; way; progress; manner; a treatise; a path; a road; a place; motion
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • sarva - whole; entire; all; every; of all sorts; manifold; various; different; completely
  • yathābhāgam - according to shares or portions; each according to his share; each in his respective place or in the proper pleasure
  • avasthā - 1.P.; ava; to reach down to; to remain standing; to be separated from; to abide; to fall into the possession of; to be absorbed in; to penetrate

  • abhirakṣ - 1.P.; abhi; to guard; to protect; to preserve
  • bhavat - your honour; your worship; your lordship or ladyship; you (lit. "the gentleman or lady present")
  • sarva - whole; entire; all; every; of all sorts; manifold; various; different; completely
  • eva - _
  • hi - _

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.12.1

tasya saṃjanayanharṣaṃ kuruvṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ

STEM:tadsaṃjanayharṣakuruvṛddhapitāmaha
INFL:tasya__kuruvṛddhaḥpitāmahaḥ
GRAM:Gen|s|mNom|s|m|PresPartAcc|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|m

VOCABULARY:

  • tad - this; gleicher
  • saṃjanay - 10.P.; sam; to bring forth; to create; to form
  • harṣa - bristling; erection (esp. of the hair in a thrill of rapture or delight); joy; pleasure; happiness; erection of the sexual organ; sexual excitement; lustfulness; ardent desire; name of an Asura; name of a son of Kṛṣṇa; name of various authors
  • kuruvṛddha - name of Bhīṣma; name of Dhṛtarāṣṭra
  • pitāmaha - a paternal grandfather; name of Brahmā; name of several authors; the Piṭris; an ancestor; name of Śiva

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.12.2

siṃhanādaṃ vinadyoccaiḥ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān

STEM:siṃhanādavinaduccaisśaṅkhadhampratāpavat
INFL:siṃhanādaṃ__śaṅkhaṃdadhmaupratāpavān
GRAM:Acc|s|mAbs.Acc|s|mPerf|3|sNom|s|m

VOCABULARY:

  • siṃhanāda - a war-cry; a confident assertion; recital of the Buddhist doctrine; a kind of bird; a kind of metre; (in music) a kind of time; name of Śiva; name of an Asura; name of a son of Rāvaṇa; name of a Śākya; name of a king of Malaya; name of the general of an army; name of a Buddhist saint
  • vinad - 1.P.; vi; to sound forth; to cry out; to roar; to bellow; to thunder
  • uccais - aloft; high; above; upwards; from above; loud; accentuated; intensely; much; powerfully; audibly
  • śaṅkha - a shell; the conch-shell (used for making libations of water or as an ornament for the arms or for the temples of an elephant); a particular high number (said to = a hundred billions)
  • dham - to blow; to blow into; to breathe out; to exhale; to kindle a fire by blowing; to melt or manufacture (metal) by blowing; to blow or cast away; to smelt (ore)
  • pratāpavat - hoheitsvoll; majest￤tisch

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.13.1

INFL:tataḥ_______
GRAM:Nom|p|mNom|p|fComp.Comp.Nom|p|m

  • śaṅkha - a shell; the conch-shell (used for making libations of water or as an ornament for the arms or for the temples of an elephant); a particular high number (said to = a hundred billions)
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • bherī - a kettle-drum
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • paṇava - a small drum; a kind of cymbal
  • ānaka - a large military drum beaten at one end; a double drum; a small drum or tabor; a thunder-cloud or a cloud to which the thunder is ascribed
  • gomukha - a crocodile; a hole in a wall of a peculiar shape made by thieves; name of one of Śiva's attendants; name of a son of Mātali; name of a king; name of a son of the treasurer of king Vatsa; name of an attendant of the 1st Arhat of the present Avasarpiṇī; a kind of musical instrument (sort of horn or trumpet ?)

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.13.2

STEM:sahasāevaabhihantadśabdatumulabhū
INFL:___sa__'bhavat
GRAM:Impf|Voice=Pass|3|pNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|mImpf|3|s

VOCABULARY:

  • sahasā - by force; forcibly; suddenly
  • eva - _
  • abhihan - 4.P.; 2.P.; abhi; to thump at; to strike; to kill; to beat (as a drum); to afflict; to visit with (instr.)
  • tad - this; gleicher
  • śabda - noise; voice; tone; note; a sound; a word; speech; language; the right word; correct expression (opp. to apa-śabda); the sacred syllable Om; (in gram.) a declinable word or a word-termination; affix; a name; appellation; title; a technical term; verbal communication or testimony; oral tradition; verbal authority or evidence (as one of the Pramāṇas); [alchemy] = śabdavedha
  • tumula - tumultuous; noisy
  • bhū - to be; to become; to come into being; to happen; to occur; to make up; gedeihen

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.14.1

STEM:tatasśvetahayayujmahatsyandanasthā
INFL:tataḥ___mahatisyandanesthitau
GRAM:Ins|p|mIns|p|mLoc|s|m|PPPLoc|s|mLoc|s|mNom|d|m|PPP

VOCABULARY:

  • tatas - from that; in consequence of that; for that reason; consequently; then; after that
  • śveta - white; dressed in white; bright; gelblichwei￟
  • haya - _
  • yuj - to yoke or join or fasten or harness (horses or a chariot); to make ready; to prepare; to arrange; to fit out; to set to work; to use; to employ; to apply; to equip (an army); to offer; to perform (prayers); to put on (arrows on a bow-string); to fix in; to insert; to inject (semen); to appoint to; to charge or intrust with; to command; to enjoin; to turn or direct or fix or concentrate (the mind); to concentrate the mind in order to obtain union with the Universal spirit; to be absorbed in meditation; to recollect; to recall; to join; to unite; to connect; to add; to bring together; to confer; to bestow anything (acc.) upon (gen. or loc.); to become possessed of; to use for one's self; to bring into possession of; to furnish or endow with (instr.); to join one's self to (acc.); (in astron.) to come into union or conjunction with (acc.); to be yoked or harnessed or joined; to attach one's self to; to be made ready or prepared for (dat.); to be united in marriage; to be endowed with or possessed of (instr. wit
  • mahat - great; large; big; huge; ample; extensive; long; abundant; numerous; considerable; important; high; eminent; abounding on rich in (instr.); distinguished by; early (morning); advanced (afternoon); violent (pain or emotion); thick (as darkness); gross; loud (as noise); many (people)
  • syandana - moving on swiftly; running (as a chariot); dripping; sprinkling; a war-chariot; chariot; Dalbergia Ougeinensis; a particular spell recited over weapons; air; wind; name of the 23rd Arhat of the past Utsarpiṇī
  • sthā - to stand; to station one's self; to get upon; to stay; to remain; to be intent upon; to keep on; to endure; to last; to be; to exist; to be at hand; to be near to; to adhere to; to serve; to behave; to be fixed on

VOCABULARY:

  • mādhava - _

  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • eva - _
  • divya - divine; heavenly; celestial; supernatural; wonderful; magical; charming; beautiful; agreeable
  • śaṅkha - a shell; the conch-shell (used for making libations of water or as an ornament for the arms or for the temples of an elephant); a particular high number (said to = a hundred billions)
  • pradham - pra; to blow before or in front; to blow away; to scare; to destroy; to blow into (esp. into a conch shell); to cry out

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.15.1

pāñcajanyaṃ hṛṣīkeśo devadattaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ

STEM:pāñcajanyahṛṣīkeśadevadattadhanaṃjaya
INFL:pāñcajanyaṃhṛṣīkeśodevadattaṃdhanaṃjayaḥ
GRAM:Acc|s|mNom|s|mAcc|s|mNom|s|m

VOCABULARY:

  • pāñcajanya - name of Kṛṣṇa's conch taken from the demon Pañcajana; fire; fish or a species of fire; name of one of the 8 Upadvīpas in Jambudvīpa
  • hṛṣīkeśa - name of the tenth month; name of a Tīrtha; name of a poet; lord of the senses (said of Manas); name of Viṣṇu; name of Kṛṣṇa
  • devadatta - name of Arjuna's conch-shell; name of one of the vital airs (which is exhaled in yawning); name of a cousin (or younger brother) and opponent of Gautama Buddha; name of a son of Uruśravas and father of agniveśya; name of a son of the Brāhman Govindadatta; name of a son of Haridatta; name of a son of king Jayadatta; name of several authors; name of a Nāga; name of a Grāma of the Bāhikas; a common name for men used in grammar; phil. etc.
  • dhanaṃjaya - fire; a particular vital air supposed to nourish the body; Plumbago Zeylanica; name of Arjuna; the 9th day of the Karmamāsa; the plant Terminalia Arjuna; name of a serpent-demon; name of a Vyāsa / Vedavyāsa; name of a king of Kaliṅga; name of a king of Kausthalapura; name of the author of the Dalarūpaka; name of a merchant; name of a Brāhman; name of a son of Viśvāmitra

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.15.2

pauṇḍraṃ dadhmau mahāśaṅkhaṃ bhīmakarmā vṛkodaraḥ

GRAM:Acc|s|mPerf|3|sComp.Acc|s|mComp.Nom|s|mNom|s|m

VOCABULARY:

  • pauṇḍra - a species of sugar-cane of a pale straw colour; (pl.) name of a people and of a country (said to include part of South Behar and Bengal); (sg.) a king of this country (regarded as a son of Vasudeva); name of the conch-shell of Bhīma; a class of clouds (?)
  • dham - to blow; to blow into; to breathe out; to exhale; to kindle a fire by blowing; to melt or manufacture (metal) by blowing; to blow or cast away; to smelt (ore)
  • mahat - great; large; big; huge; ample; extensive; long; abundant; numerous; considerable; important; high; eminent; abounding on rich in (instr.); distinguished by; early (morning); advanced (afternoon); violent (pain or emotion); thick (as darkness); gross; loud (as noise); many (people)
  • śaṅkha - a shell; the conch-shell (used for making libations of water or as an ornament for the arms or for the temples of an elephant); a particular high number (said to = a hundred billions)
  • bhīma - fearful; terrific; terrible; tremendous; awful
  • karman - _
  • vṛkodara - name of Bhīma; name of Brahmā; a class of demons attendant on Śiva

  • kuntī - name of Pṛthā; name of a Rākṣasī; name of a river; the wife of a Brāhman; the plant Boswellia thurifera; a fragrant resin; Stereospermum suaveolens D.C.
  • putra - a son; child; a species of small venomous animal; (in astrol.) name of the fifth house; name of a son of Brahmiṣṭha; name of a son of Manu; a Bodhisattva; [gramm.] the word 'putra'
  • yudhiṣṭhira - name of the eldest of the 5 reputed sons of Pāṇḍu; name of a son of Kṛṣṇa; name of two kings of Kaśmīra; name of a potter; name of a preceptor; the descendants of Yudhiṣṭhira

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.17.1

  • iṣvāsa - a bow; an archer; a warrior
  • śikhaṇḍin - a peacock; a peacock's tail; a cock; an arrow; one who attains a particular degree of emancipation; name of Viṣṇu-Kṛṣṇa; name of a Ṛṣi or Muni (one of the seven stars of the Great Bear); name of a son of Drupada; name of a Brāhman; name of a mountain; name of a Vidyeśvara

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.18.1

  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • sarvaśas - wholly; completely; entirely; thoroughly; collectively; altogether; in general; universally (sometimes used to denote that a collective noun in or the may be in any case or); in every or any way; universally; always; everywhere; on all sides
  • pṛthivīpati - a prince; king; name of Yama; name of an author; a species of bulbous plant growing on the Himālaya; [rel.] name of Viṣṇu

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.18.2

saubhadraśca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhāndadhmuḥ pṛthakpṛthak

INFL:________
GRAM:Nom|s|mComp.Nom|s|mAcc|p|mPerf|3|p

VOCABULARY:

  • saubhadra - metron. of Abhimanyu
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • mahat - great; large; big; huge; ample; extensive; long; abundant; numerous; considerable; important; high; eminent; abounding on rich in (instr.); distinguished by; early (morning); advanced (afternoon); violent (pain or emotion); thick (as darkness); gross; loud (as noise); many (people)
  • bāhu - the arm; the fore-arm; the arm between the elbow and the wrist (opp. to pra-gaṇḍa); the whole upper extremity of the body; the arm as a measure of length (= 12 Aṅgulas); the fore-foot of an animal (esp. its upper part); the limb of a bow; the bar of a chariot-pole; the post (of a door); the side of an angular figure (esp. the base of a right-angled triangle); the shadow of the gnomon on a sun-dial; the constellation Ārdrā
  • śaṅkha - a shell; the conch-shell (used for making libations of water or as an ornament for the arms or for the temples of an elephant); a particular high number (said to = a hundred billions)
  • dham - to blow; to blow into; to breathe out; to exhale; to kindle a fire by blowing; to melt or manufacture (metal) by blowing; to blow or cast away; to smelt (ore)
  • pṛthak - widely apart; separately; differently; singly; severally; one by one (often repeated); apart or separately or differently from; (with abl.) without; except; save; here and there
  • pṛthak - widely apart; separately; differently; singly; severally; one by one (often repeated); apart or separately or differently from; (with abl.) without; except; save; here and there

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.19.1

sa ghoṣo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ hṛdayāni vyadārayat

STEM:tadghoṣadhārtarāṣṭrahṛdayavidāray
INFL:saghoṣodhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃhṛdayānivyadārayat
GRAM:Nom|s|mNom|s|mGen|p|mAcc|p|nImpf|3|s

VOCABULARY:

  • tad - this; gleicher
  • ghoṣa - indistinct noise; tumult; confused cries of a multitude; battle-cry; cries of victory; cries of woe or distress; any cry or sound; roar of animals; the sound of a drum; the sound of a conchshell; the sound of the Soma stones; the sound of a carriage; the whizzing or whir of a bow-string; crackling of fire; singing in the ear; the roaring of a storm; the sound of the recital of prayers; the sound of words spoken at a distance; rumour; report; a proclamation; a sound (of speech); the soft sound heard in the articulation of the sonant consonants; the vowels; an ornament that makes a tinkling sound; a station of herdsmen; the inhabitants of a station of herdsmen; a particular form of a temple; a musquito; Luffa foetida or a similar plant; name of Śiva; name of a man; name of an Asura; name of a prince of the Kāṇva dynasty; name of a son of Dakṣa's daughter Lambā; name of an Arhat; a common name for a Kāyastha or one of the writer caste W; name of a people or country
  • dhārtarāṣṭra - _
  • hṛdaya - the heart (or region of the heart as the seat of feelings and sensations); soul; mind (as the seat of mental operations); the heart or interior of the body; the heart or centre or core or essence or best or dearest or most secret part of anything. &c; true or divine knowledge; the Veda; science; name of a Sāman
  • vidāray - 10.P.; vi; to disperse; to push away; to cause to burst asunder; to lacerate; to open

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.19.2

nabhaśca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo vyanunādayan

STEM:nabhascapṛthivīcaevatumulavyanunāday
INFL:__pṛthivīṃ__tumulovyanunādayan
GRAM:Acc|s|nAcc|s|fNom|s|mNom|s|m|PresPart

VOCABULARY:

  • nabhas - _
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • pṛthivī - the earth or wide world; land; ground; soil; earth regarded as one of the elements
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • eva - _
  • tumula - tumultuous; noisy
  • vyanunāday - vyanu; to cause to resound; to fill with noise or cries

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.20.1

INFL:atha____

VOCABULARY:

  • atha - an auspicious and inceptive particle (not easily expressed in English); now; then; moreover; rather; certainly; but; else; what? how else?
  • vyavasthā - 1.P.; vyava; to go apart; to separate from (abl.); to differ respectively; to halt; to stop; to stay; to prepare or make ready for (dat.); to be settled; to be (logically) true or tenable; to appear as (nom.); to fix on; to direct towards; to charge with; to appoint to (artham); to stop; to hold up
  • dṛś - to behold; to look at; to regard; to consider; to see; to wait on; to visit; to see with the mind; to learn; to understand; to notice; to care for; to look into; to try; to examine; to see by divine intuition; to think or find out; to compose; to contrive (hymns); to be seen; to become visible; to appear; to be shown or manifested; to appear as; to prove

  • kapidhvaja - name of Arjuna

  • śastra - an instrument for cutting or wounding; knife; sword; dagger; any weapon (even applied to an arrow); any instrument or tool; iron; steel; a razor; [min.] = tīkṣṇaloha

  • dhanus - a bow; a measure of length = 4 Hastas or 1/2000 Gavyūti; (geom.) an Arc or past of a circle; (astron.) an are or quadrant for ascertaining the sun's altitude and śenith-distance; a fiddlestick; the sign of the zodiac Sagittarius; Buchanania Latifolia; name of Śiva (armed with a bow); a desert; arid land

  • sad - to sit down (esp. at a sacrifice); to sit upon or in or at (acc. or loc.); to sit down before; to besiege; to lie in wait for; to watch (acc.); to sink down; to sink into despondency or distress; to become faint or wearied or dejected or low-spirited; to despond; to despair; to pine or waste away; to perish; reiten

VOCABULARY:

  • yadi - in case that; if

  • etad - this; [gramm.] the pronoun etad; auf diese Weise

  • dṛś - to behold; to look at; to regard; to consider; to see; to wait on; to visit; to see with the mind; to learn; to understand; to notice; to care for; to look into; to try; to examine; to see by divine intuition; to think or find out; to compose; to contrive (hymns); to be seen; to become visible; to appear; to be shown or manifested; to appear as; to prove
  • lobha - perplexity; confusion; impatience; eager desire for or longing after; covetousness; cupidity; avarice (personified as a son of Puṣṭi or of Dambha and Māyā)
  • upahan - upa; to beat; to hit at; to strike; to touch; to stick on; to put on; to force in; to ram; to take hold of; to seize; to take out; to hit; to hurt; to damage; to visit; to afflict; to impede; to spoil; to make a mistake in reciting; to blunder; to err; to collect
  • cetas - splendour; consciousness; intelligence; thinking soul; heart; mind; will

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 1.38.2

kulakṣayakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ mitradrohe ca pātakam

STEM:kulakṣayakṛdoṣamitradrohacapātaka
INFL:___doṣaṃ__capātakam
GRAM:Comp.Comp.Acc|s|m|PPPAcc|s|mComp.Loc|s|mAcc|s|n

VOCABULARY:

  • kula - a herd; troop; flock; assemblage; multitude; number; a race; family; community; tribe; caste; set; company; a lot; gang; the residence of a family; seat of a community; inhabited country (as much ground as can be ploughed by two ploughs each drawn by six bulls) [29; a house; abode; a noble or eminent family or race; high station; the body; the front; forepart; a blue stone; supreme power or energy
  • kṣaya - loss; waste; wane; diminution; destruction; decay; wasting or wearing away (often ifc.); fall (as of prices); removal; end; termination; consumption; phthisis pulmonalis; sickness in general; the destruction of the universe; (in alg.) a negative quantity; minus; name of a prince; [medic.] a kind of mūtrāghāta
  • kṛ - to make like or similar; to consider equivalent; to reduce anything to; to cause to become; to do; to accomplish; to prepare; to make use of; to compose; to act; das Nachdenken hinrichten
  • doṣa - fault; vice; deficiency; want; inconvenience; disadvantage; badness; wickedness; sinfulness; offence; transgression; guilt; crime; damage; harm; bad consequence; detrimental effect; accusation; reproach; alteration; affection; morbid element; disease (esp. of the 3 humours of the body); a calf; [alchemy] a kind of flaw in mercury
  • mitra - a friend; companion; name of an Āditya (generally invoked together with Varuṇa); the sun; name of a Marut; name of a son of Vasiṣṭha and various other men; name of the third Muhūrta
  • droha - injury; mischief; perfidy; treachery; wrong; offence; harm; hatred
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • pātaka - sin; crime; loss of caste

  • saṃkara - mixing together; commingling; intermixture confusion (esp. of castes or races); the offspring of a mixed marriage; any action similar to the intermixture of castes; (in rhet.) the confusion or blending together of metaphors which ought to be kept distinct; anything that may be defiled by the touch of any unclean thing; dung; dust; sweepings; the crackling of flame; name of a man; [alchemy] an amalgam of metals or minerals; [medic.] a kind of vapour-bath

  • manuṣya - a man; human being; a man (as opp. to woman); a husband; a class of deceased ancestors (those who receive the Piṇḍa offering)
  • janārdana - Viṣṇu or Kṛṣṇa; name of several men; name of a locality

  • tu - do; now; then; but; and; or; name of the river Śatadru

  • iha - in this place; here; to this place; in this world; in this book or system; in this case; now; at this time
  • eva - _
  • bhuj - to enjoy; to use; to eat; to consume; to enjoy carnally; to exploit; to profit someone
  • bhoga - enjoyment; eating; feeding on; possession; use
  • rudhira - blood; saffron; name of a city
  • pradih - 6.P.; 2.P.; pra; to smear over; to besmear; to anoint

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.14.1

GRAM:Comp.Nom|p|mVoc|s|mComp.Comp.Comp.Comp.Nom|p|m

VOCABULARY:

  • mātrā - measure (of any kind); quantity; duration; number; degree; unit of measure; foot; unit of time; moment; metrical unit; a mora or prosodial instant; the length of time required to pronounce a short vowel (a long vowel contains 2 Mātrās); musical unit of time (3 in number); the full measure of anything; right or correct measure; order; a minute portion; particle; atom; trifle; matter; the material world; materials; property; goods; household; furniture; money; wealth; substance; livelihood; a mirror; an ear-ring; jewel; ornament; the upper or horizontal limb of the Nāgarī characters
  • sparśa - touch; contact (fig. applied to the beginning of an eclipse or to any astron. contact); (in gram.) collective name of the twenty-five consonants constituting the five classes from k to m (so-called because formed by complete contact of the organs of utterance; (in phil.) the quality of tangibility (which constitutes the skin's viṣaya); any quality which is perceptible by touching any object (e.g. heat); feeling; sensation; pleasant feeling; unpleasant or morbid sensation; illness; air; wind; temperature; a kind of sexual union; a gift; offering; a spy
  • tu - do; now; then; but; and; or; name of the river Śatadru
  • kaunteya - metron. from Kuntī; name of Yudhiṣṭhira; Bhīmasena; Arjuna; the tree Terminalia Arjuna; the Pāṇḍavas
  • śīta - cold; coldness; cold weather; cold water; Cassia bark; [min.] lead; tin
  • uṣṇa - heat; warmth; the hot season; any hot object; name of certain positions in the retrograde motion of the planet Mars; name of the Varṣa ruled by Uṣṇa [[name of a Varsha]]; name of a son of Dyutimat; name of a future son of Nicaknu
  • sukha - _
  • duḥkha - _
  • da - granting; offering; effecting; producing

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.24.1

acchedyo 'yamadāhyo 'yamakledyo 'śoṣya eva ca

STEM:acchedyaidamadāhyaidamakledyaaśoṣyaevaca
INFL:acchedyo____'śoṣyaevaca
GRAM:Nom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|m

VOCABULARY:

  • acchedya - improper or impossible to be cut; indivisible
  • idam - this; (near deictic pronoun in Vedic)
  • adāhya - incombustible
  • idam - this; (near deictic pronoun in Vedic)
  • akledya - not to be wetted
  • aśoṣya - not drying up; permanent (as a pond)
  • eva - _
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.24.2

nityaḥ sarvagataḥ sthāṇuracalo 'yaṃ sanātanaḥ

STEM:nityasarvagamsthāṇuacalaidamsanātana
INFL:nityaḥ____'yaṃsanātanaḥ
GRAM:Nom|s|mComp.Nom|s|m|PPPNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|m

VOCABULARY:

  • nitya - innate; native; one's own (opp. to araṇa); continual; perpetual; eternal; ifc. constantly dwelling or engaged in; intent upon; devoted or used to; ordinary; usual; invariable; fixed; necessary; obligatory (opp. to kāmya); leiblich (Kind)
  • sarva - whole; entire; all; every; of all sorts; manifold; various; different; completely
  • gam - to go; to move; to approach; to understand; to reside (as a disease)
  • sthāṇu - _
  • acala - not moving; immovable; firm
  • idam - this; (near deictic pronoun in Vedic)
  • sanātana - perpetual; permanent; everlasting; primeval; ancient

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.25.1

STEM:avyaktaidamacintyaidamavikāryaidamvac
INFL:avyakto______
GRAM:Nom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|mPass|3|s

VOCABULARY:

  • avyakta - _
  • idam - this; (near deictic pronoun in Vedic)
  • acintya - inconceivable; surpassing thought
  • idam - this; (near deictic pronoun in Vedic)
  • avikārya - invariable; unchangeable
  • idam - this; (near deictic pronoun in Vedic)
  • vac - to speak; to say; to tell; to declare; to proclaim; to recite; verk￼nden

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.25.2

tasmādevaṃ viditvainaṃ nānuśocitumarhasi

STEM:tasmātevamvidenadnaanuśucarh
INFL:_______
GRAM:Abs.Acc|s|mInf.Pres|2|s

VOCABULARY:

  • tasmāt - therefore
  • evam - _
  • vid - to know; to understand; to learn; to be conscious of; to take for; to mind; to notice
  • enad - this; (anaphoric pronoun in Vedic)
  • na - _
  • anuśuc - 1.P.; anu; to mourn over; to regret; to bewail
  • arh - to deserve; to merit; to be worthy of; to be allowed to; to be able; to counterbalance

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.26.1

atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam

STEM:athacaenadnityajannityavāmanmṛ
INFL:atha____nityaṃvāmanyasemṛtam
GRAM:Acc|s|mComp.Acc|s|m|PPPAcc|s|mPres|2|sAcc|s|m|PPP

VOCABULARY:

  • atha - an auspicious and inceptive particle (not easily expressed in English); now; then; moreover; rather; certainly; but; else; what? how else?
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • enad - this; (anaphoric pronoun in Vedic)
  • nitya - innate; native; one's own (opp. to araṇa); continual; perpetual; eternal; ifc. constantly dwelling or engaged in; intent upon; devoted or used to; ordinary; usual; invariable; fixed; necessary; obligatory (opp. to kāmya); leiblich (Kind)
  • jan - to come into existence; to grow (as plants); to be born as; to be by birth or nature; to be born again; to become; to be; to be changed into (dat.); to take place; to happen; to be possible or applicable or suitable; to produce; to generate; to be born
  • nitya - innate; native; one's own (opp. to araṇa); continual; perpetual; eternal; ifc. constantly dwelling or engaged in; intent upon; devoted or used to; ordinary; usual; invariable; fixed; necessary; obligatory (opp. to kāmya); leiblich (Kind)
  • vā - either - or; on the one side - on the other side; optionally
  • man - to think; to believe; to imagine; to suppose; to conjecture; to regard or consider any one or anything (acc.) as; to be of opinion; to honour; to perceive; to understand
  • mṛ - to die; to decease; to calcine

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.26.2

tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho nainaṃ śocitumarhasi

STEM:tathāapitvadmahatbāhunaenadśucarh
INFL:__tvaṃ______
GRAM:Nom|s|?Comp.Voc|s|mAcc|s|mInf.Pres|2|s

VOCABULARY:

  • tathā - in that manner; so; thus; yes; so be it; so it shall be (particle of assent); so also; in like manner
  • api - also; moreover; besides; assuredly; surely
  • tvad - you
  • mahat - great; large; big; huge; ample; extensive; long; abundant; numerous; considerable; important; high; eminent; abounding on rich in (instr.); distinguished by; early (morning); advanced (afternoon); violent (pain or emotion); thick (as darkness); gross; loud (as noise); many (people)
  • bāhu - the arm; the fore-arm; the arm between the elbow and the wrist (opp. to pra-gaṇḍa); the whole upper extremity of the body; the arm as a measure of length (= 12 Aṅgulas); the fore-foot of an animal (esp. its upper part); the limb of a bow; the bar of a chariot-pole; the post (of a door); the side of an angular figure (esp. the base of a right-angled triangle); the shadow of the gnomon on a sun-dial; the constellation Ārdrā
  • na - _
  • enad - this; (anaphoric pronoun in Vedic)
  • śuc - to shine; to gleam; to glow; to burn; to suffer violent heat or pain; to be sorrowful or afflicted; to grieve; to mourn at or for; to bewail; to lament; to regret (acc.); to be absorbed in deep meditation; to be bright or pure; to be wet; to decay; to be putrid; to stink; to flame; to languish
  • arh - to deserve; to merit; to be worthy of; to be allowed to; to be able; to counterbalance

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.27.1

INFL:jātasyahidhruvomṛtyurdhruvaṃjanmamṛtasyaca
GRAM:Gen|s|m|PPPNom|s|mNom|s|mNom|s|nNom|s|nGen|s|m|PPP

  • hi - _
  • dhruva - _
  • mṛtyu - death; dying; Death personified; the god of disease (sometimes identified with Yama or with Viṣṇu); name of the god of love; name of a particular Ekāha; name of the 8th astrol. house; name of the 17th astrol. Yoga; name of a Vyāsa
  • dhruva - _
  • janman - birth; origin; existence; life; nativity; re-birth; birthplace; home; a progenitor; father; natal star; (in astrol.) name of the 1st lunar mansion; a creature; being; people; the people of a household; kind; race; gods and men; nature; quality; custom; manner; water; age (of life)
  • mṛ - to die; to decease; to calcine
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.27.2

  • na - _

  • śuc - to shine; to gleam; to glow; to burn; to suffer violent heat or pain; to be sorrowful or afflicted; to grieve; to mourn at or for; to bewail; to lament; to regret (acc.); to be absorbed in deep meditation; to be bright or pure; to be wet; to decay; to be putrid; to stink; to flame; to languish

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.28.1

avyaktādīni bhūtāni vyaktamadhyāni bhārata

INFL:__bhūtāni__bhārata
GRAM:Comp.Nom|p|nNom|p|nComp.Nom|p|nVoc|s|m

VOCABULARY:

  • avyakta - _
  • ādi - beginning; commencement; a firstling; first-fruits; ifc. beginning with; et caetera; and so on; name of Śiva; [gramm.] the first syllable of a word
  • bhūta - that which is or exists; any living being; a spirit (good or evil); the ghost of a deceased person; a demon; imp; goblin; an element; one of the 5 elements (esp. a gross element); name of the number "five"; well-being; welfare; prosperity; existence
  • vyakta - _
  • madhya - the middle; midst; centre; inside; interior; the middle of the sky; space between; midday; the meridian; intermediate condition between (gen.); the belly; abdomen; the flank of a horse; (in music) mean time; ten thousand billions; cessation; pause; interval; name of a country between Sindh and Hindūstan proper
  • bhārata - actor; fire; a descendant of Bharata; name of the author of RV; V. 27; name of the sun shining on the south of Meru

VOCABULARY:

  • eva - _
  • tatra - in that place; there (in comp.); thither; to that place; in that; therein; in that case; on that occasion; under those circumstances; then; therefore
  • ka - who?; what?
  • paridevanā - complaint; lamentation

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.32.1

GRAM:Ins|s|fNom|s|n|PPPComp.Nom|s|nNom|s|n|PPP

  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as

  • svarga - heaven; the abode of light and of the gods; heavenly bliss; Indra's heaven or paradise; a particular Ekāha; name of a son of the Rudra Bhīma
  • dvāra - door; gate; passage; entrance; opening; aperture (esp. of the human body); a way; means; medium; a pass (in the mountains)
  • apāvṛ - apā; to uncover; to reveal; to open (the mouth)

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.32.2

  • labh - to take; to seize; to catch; to meet with; to find
  • yuddha - fight; war; (in astron.) opposition; conflict of the planets; battle
  • īdṛśa - endowed with such qualities; such

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.33.1

atha cettvamimaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi

STEM:athacedtvadidamdharmyasaṃgrāmanakṛ
INFL:atha___dharmyaṃsaṃgrāmaṃnakariṣyasi
GRAM:Nom|s|?Acc|s|mAcc|s|mAcc|s|mFut|2|s

VOCABULARY:

  • atha - an auspicious and inceptive particle (not easily expressed in English); now; then; moreover; rather; certainly; but; else; what? how else?
  • ced - (never found at the beginning of a sentence or verse) = ca; when
  • tvad - you
  • idam - this; (near deictic pronoun in Vedic)
  • dharmya - legal; legitimate; usual; customary; just; virtuous; righteous; endowed with qualities or properties; suitable to (gen.)
  • saṃgrāma - an assembly of people; host; troop; army; battle; war; fight; combat; conflict; hostile encounter with; name of various men
  • na - _
  • kṛ - to make like or similar; to consider equivalent; to reduce anything to; to cause to become; to do; to accomplish; to prepare; to make use of; to compose; to act; das Nachdenken hinrichten

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.33.2

tataḥ svadharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpamavāpsyasi

STEM:tatassvadharmakīrticahāpāpaavāp
INFL:tataḥsvadharmaṃkīrtiṃcahitvā__
GRAM:Acc|s|mAcc|s|fAbs.Acc|s|nFut|2|s

VOCABULARY:

  • tatas - from that; in consequence of that; for that reason; consequently; then; after that
  • svadharma - one's own rights; one's own duty; peculiar property; peculiarity
  • kīrti - mention; making mention of; speech; report; good report; fame; renown; glory; Fame (personified as daughter of Dakṣa and wife of Dharma); (in music) a particular measure or time; extension; expansion; lustre; = prasāda (favour) or prāsāda (a palace); dirt; name of one of the Mātṛkās (or personified divine energies of Kṛṣṇa)
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • hā - to leave; to abandon; to desert; to quit; to forsake; to relinquish; to be left or abandoned or deserted; to be left behind; to fall short of (abl.); to be excluded from or bereft of; to be overtaken by (instr.); to be deficient or wanting; to suffer loss or injury
  • pāpa - evil; misfortune; ill-luck; trouble; mischief; sin; vice; crime; guilt
  • avāp - 5.P.; ava; to reach; to attain; to obtain; to gain; to get; to get by division (as a quotient); to suffer (e.g. blame or unpleasantness or pain)

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.34.1

  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • api - also; moreover; besides; assuredly; surely
  • bhūta - that which is or exists; any living being; a spirit (good or evil); the ghost of a deceased person; a demon; imp; goblin; an element; one of the 5 elements (esp. a gross element); name of the number "five"; well-being; welfare; prosperity; existence
  • kathay - to call; to name; to tell; to designate
  • tvad - you
  • avyaya - not liable to change; imperishable; undecaying; parsimonious

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.34.2

STEM:sambhāvaycaakīrtimaraṇaatiric
INFL:saṃbhāvitasya____
GRAM:Gen|s|m|PPPNom|s|fAbl|s|nPass|3|s

VOCABULARY:

  • sambhāvay - 10.P.; sam; to cause to be born or produced; to effect; to accomplish; to make; to foster; to cherish; to resort to (acc.); to meet with; to find (jīvantīm); to honour; to revere; to salute; to greet; to receive or accept graciously; to imply; to suggest a possibility; to suppose anything possible in any one; to regard or consider as (two acc.); to think it possible that (Pot. with and without yad); to think it impossible that; to reach; to arrive at (acc.); to be (thought) possible or probable or fitting or consistent
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • akīrti - ill-fame; disgrace
  • maraṇa - _
  • atiric - 4.Ā.; ati; to be left with a surplus; to surpass (in a good or bad sense with abl. or acc.); to be superior; to predominate; to prevail; [alchemy]; to be superabundant

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 2.35.1

bhayādraṇāduparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ

STEM:bhayaraṇauparammantvadmahatratha
INFL:___maṃsyantetvāṃ__
GRAM:Abl|s|nAbl|s|mAcc|s|m|PPPFut|3|pAcc|s|?Comp.Nom|p|m

VOCABULARY:

  • as - to be; to live; to exist; to be present; to take place; to happen; to abide; to dwell; to stay; to belong to (gen. or dat.); to fall to the share of; to be equal to (dat.); to turn out; to tend towards any result; to prove
  • iti - in this manner; thus (in its original signification iti refers to something that has been said or thought); so; [gramm.] the word iti
  • vādin - saying; discoursing; speaking; talking; speaking or talking about (often ifc. or sometimes with acc. of object); declaring; proclaiming; denoting; designating (or sometimes = designated as); producing sounds

  • buddhi - the power of forming and retaining conceptions and general notions; intelligence; reason; intellect; mind; discernment; judgment; perception; comprehension; apprehension; understanding; knowledge of one's self. psychology; (in Sāṃkhya phil.)   • niyam - 1.P.; ni; to stop (trans.); to hold back; to detain with; to stop (intrans.); to stay; to remain; to keep back; to refuse; to fail; to be wanting; to fasten; to tie to; to bind up (hair etc.); to hold over; to extend; to hold downwards (the hand); to bring near; to procure; to bestow; to grant; to offer; to present (rain); to hold in; to keep down; to restrain; to control; to govern; to regulate (as breath); to suppress or conceal (one's nature); to destroy; to annihilate; to restrict; to fix upon; to settle; to determine; to establish; (in gram.) to lower; to pronounce low i.e. with the Anudātta
  • ārabh - 1.P.; ā; to lay or take hold of; to keep fast; to cling to; to gain a footing; to enter; to reach; to attain; to undertake; to commence; to begin; to make; to produce; to form; to compose
  • arjuna - a peacock; cutaneous disease; Terminalia arjuna Bedd.; name of a man; name of Indra (who was a son of Kṛtavīrya who was slain by Paraśurāma); name of a Śāskya (known as a mathematician); name of different other persons; the only son of his mother; the descendants of Arjuna; Pentaptera arjuna Roxb.

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 3.15.1

STEM:karmanbrahmanudbhavavidbrahmanakṣarasamudbhava
INFL:karma__viddhi___
GRAM:Acc|s|nComp.Acc|s|nImp|2|sAcc|s|nComp.Acc|s|n

VOCABULARY:

  • karman - _
  • brahman - pious effusion or utterance; outpouring of the heart in worshipping the gods; prayer; the sacred word (as opp. to vāc); the Veda; a sacred text; a text or Mantra used as a spell; the Brāhmaṇa portion of the Veda; the sacred syllable Om; religious or spiritual knowledge (opp. to religious observances and bodily mortification such as tapas etc.); holy life (esp. continence); the Brahma or one selfexistent impersonal spirit; the one universal Soul (or one divine essence and source from which all created things emanate or with which they are identified and to which they return); the Self-existent; the Absolute; the Eternal; the class of men who are the repositories and communicators of sacred knowledge; the Brāhmanical caste as a body (rarely an individual Brāhman); food; wealth; final emancipation; study
  • udbhava - _
  • vid - to know; to understand; to learn; to be conscious of; to take for; to mind; to notice
  • brahman - pious effusion or utterance; outpouring of the heart in worshipping the gods; prayer; the sacred word (as opp. to vāc); the Veda; a sacred text; a text or Mantra used as a spell; the Brāhmaṇa portion of the Veda; the sacred syllable Om; religious or spiritual knowledge (opp. to religious observances and bodily mortification such as tapas etc.); holy life (esp. continence); the Brahma or one selfexistent impersonal spirit; the one universal Soul (or one divine essence and source from which all created things emanate or with which they are identified and to which they return); the Self-existent; the Absolute; the Eternal; the class of men who are the repositories and communicators of sacred knowledge; the Brāhmanical caste as a body (rarely an individual Brāhman); food; wealth; final emancipation; study
  • akṣara - the syllable om; a vowel; a sound; a word; name of Brahma; final beatitude; sacrifice; water; Achyranthes Aspera; religious austerity; a syllable
  • samudbhava - existence; production; origin; coming to life again; revival; name of Agni at the Vratādeśa

  • sarvaśas - wholly; completely; entirely; thoroughly; collectively; altogether; in general; universally (sometimes used to denote that a collective noun in or the may be in any case or); in every or any way; universally; always; everywhere; on all sides

  • sarva - whole; entire; all; every; of all sorts; manifold; various; different; completely

VOCABULARY:

  • indriya - power; force; the quality which belongs especially to the mighty Indra; exhibition of power; powerful act; bodily power; power of the senses; virile power; semen virile; faculty of sense; sense; organ of sense; the number five as symbolical of the five senses
  • manas - mind (in its widest sense as applied to all the mental powers); intellect; intelligence; understanding; perception; sense; conscience; will (in phil. the internal organ or antaḥ-karaṇa of perception and cognition); the spirit or spiritual principle; the breath or living soul which escapes from the body at death (called asu in animals); thought; imagination; excogitation; invention; reflection; opinion; intention; inclination; affection; desire; mood; temper; spirit; name of the 26th Kalpa; name of the lake Mānasa
  • buddhi - the power of forming and retaining conceptions and general notions; intelligence; reason; intellect; mind; discernment; judgment; perception; comprehension; apprehension; understanding; knowledge of one's self. psychology; (in Sāṃkhya phil.) Intellect; presence of mind; ready wit; an opinion; view; notion; idea; conjecture; thought about or meditation on; intention; purpose; design; impression; notion (often ifc. = considering as); right opinion; correct or reasonable view; a kind of metre; name of the 5th astrol" mansion; Intelligence personified (as a daughter of Dakṣa and wife of Dharma and mother of Bodha); name of a woman; belief
  • idam - this; (near deictic pronoun in Vedic)
  • adhiṣṭhāna - standing by; being at hand; approach; standing or resting upon; a basis; base; the standing-place of the warrior upon the car; a position; site; residence; abode; seat; a settlement; town; standing over; government; authority; power; a precedent; rule; a benediction; plinth
  • vac - to speak; to say; to tell; to declare; to proclaim; to recite; verk￼nden

  • ṛṣabha - _

  • yoga - the act of yoking; joining; attaching; harnessing; putting to (of horses); a yoke; team; vehicle; conveyance; employment; use; application; performance; equipping or arraying (of an army); fixing (of an arrow on the bow-string); putting on (of armour); a remedy; cure; a means; expedient; device; way; manner; method; a supernatural means; charm; incantation; magical art; a trick; stratagem; fraud; deceit; undertaking; business; work; acquisition; gain; profit; wealth; property; occasion; opportunity; any junction; union; combination; contact with (instr. with or without saha); mixture; partaking of; possessing (instr. or comp.); connection; relation; putting together; arrangement; disposition; regular succession; fitting together; fitness; propriety; exertion; endeavour; zeal; diligence; industry; care; application or concentration of the thoughts; abstract contemplation; meditation; self-concentration; abstract meditation and mental abstraction practised as a system; any simple act or rite conducive to Yoga o
  • pravac - 3.P.; 2.P.; pra; to proclaim; to announce; to praise; to commend; to mention; to teach; to impart; to explain; verk￼nden
  • mad - I; we
  • avyaya - not liable to change; imperishable; undecaying; parsimonious

  • paraṃtapa - destroying foes (said of heroes)

VOCABULARY:

  • sama - even; flat; level; parallel; same; similar; like; equivalent; fair; constant; ordinary; common; good; upright; easy; whole
  • siddhi - _
  • asiddhi - imperfect accomplishment; failure; (in logic) want of proof; conclusion not warranted by the premises; (in Sāṅkhya phil.) incompleteness (eight forms of it are enumerated)
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • kṛ - to make like or similar; to consider equivalent; to reduce anything to; to cause to become; to do; to accomplish; to prepare; to make use of; to compose; to act; das Nachdenken hinrichten
  • api - also; moreover; besides; assuredly; surely
  • na - _
  • nibandh - 4.P.; 1.P.; 9.Ā.; ni; to bind on; to tie; to fasten to; to enchain; to fetter (lit. and fig.); to contract; to unite; to join; to close; to obstruct; to compose; to draw up; to write down; to catch; to win; to acquire; to hold fast; to restrain; to check; to put or fix upon; to undertake; to begin; to fix; to place; to locate; to show; to exhibit; [alchemy]

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 4.23.1

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 4.24.1

  • hu - to sacrifice (esp. pour butter into the fire); to offer or present an oblation (acc. or gen.) to (dat.) or in; to sacrifice to; to worship or honour (acc.) with (instr.); to sprinkle on; libieren

  • ced - (never found at the beginning of a sentence or verse) = ca; when
  • as - to be; to live; to exist; to be present; to take place; to happen; to abide; to dwell; to stay; to belong to (gen. or dat.); to fall to the share of; to be equal to (dat.); to turn out; to tend towards any result; to prove
  • pāpa - bad; wicked; evil; vile; low; inauspicious; miserable
  • sarva - whole; entire; all; every; of all sorts; manifold; various; different; completely
  • pāpa - evil; misfortune; ill-luck; trouble; mischief; sin; vice; crime; guilt
  • kṛttama - (ifc.) doing most of ...

  • plava - a kind of aquatic bird; a frog; a monkey; sheep; a Caṇḍāla; an enemy; Ficus Infectoria; a snare or basket of wicker-work for catching fish; the 35th (or 9th) year in a cycle of Jupiter; swimming; bathing; flooding; a flood; the swelling of a river; the prolated utterance of a vowel; protraction of a sentence through 3 or more Ślokas; sloping down or towards; proclivity; inclination; (in astrol.) = plava-tva; a kind of metre; name of a Sāman; jumping; leaping; plunging; going by leaps or plunges; returning; urging on

  • saṃnyāsa - putting or throwing down; laying aside; resignation; abandonment of (gen. or comp.); renunciation of the world; profession of asceticism; abstinence from food; giving up the body; sudden death; complete exhaustion; deposit; trust; compact; agreement; stake; wager; Indian spikenard; [alchemy] a saṃskāra of mercury; Schlagflu￟

  • yoga - the act of yoking; joining; attaching; harnessing; putting to (of horses); a yoke; team; vehicle; conveyance; employment; use; application; performance; equipping or arraying (of an army); fixing (of an arrow on the bow-string); putting on (of armour); a remedy; cure; a means; expedient; device; way; manner; method; a supernatural means; charm; incantation; magical art; a trick; stratagem; fraud; deceit; undertaking; business; work; acquisition; gain; profit; wealth; property; occasion; opportunity; any junction; union; combination; contact with (instr. with or without saha); mixture; partaking of; possessing (instr. or comp.); connection; relation; putting together; arrangement; disposition; regular succession; fitting together; fitness; propriety; exertion; endeavour; zeal; diligence; industry; care; application or concentration of the thoughts; abstract contemplation; meditation; self-concentration; abstract meditation and mental abstraction practised as a system; any simple act or rite conducive to Yoga o
  • viśiṣ - vi; to distinguish; to make distinct or different; to particularize; to specify; to define; to distinguish (from others); to prefer to (instr.); to augment; to enhance; to differ from (abl. or instr.); to be pre-eminent; to excel; to be better than (abl. or instr.) or best among (gen. or loc.)

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 5.03.1

  • mahat - great; large; big; huge; ample; extensive; long; abundant; numerous; considerable; important; high; eminent; abounding on rich in (instr.); distinguished by; early (morning); advanced (afternoon); violent (pain or emotion); thick (as darkness); gross; loud (as noise); many (people)

  • tattva - true or real state; truth; reality; (in phil.) a true principle; the number 24; the number 25; an element or elementary property; the essence or substance of anything; the being that; name of a musical instrument; eines der 36 Elemente der Weltemanation (Trika)

  • phala - fruit (esp. of trees); the kernel or seed of a fruit; a nutmeg; the 3 myrobalans; the menstrual discharge; fruit (met.); consequence; effect; result; retribution (good or bad); gain or loss; reward or punishment; advantage or disadvantage; benefit; enjoyment; compensation; (in rhet.) the issue or end of an action; (in math.) the result of a calculation; product or quotient; corrective equation; area or superficial contents of a figure; interest on capital; the third term in a rule of three sum; a gift; donation; a gaming board; a blade (of a sword or knife); the point of an arrow; a shield; a ploughshare; a point or spot on a die; [gemm.]; [gramm.] the root phal

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 5.22.1

ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te

STEM:yadhisaṃsparśajabhogaduḥkhayonievatad
INFL:yehi__bhogā__evate

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 6.01.1

INFL:___

VOCABULARY:

  • akriya - without works; inactive; abstaining from religious rites; impious

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 6.08.1

  • tṛp - to enjoy; to satisfy; to become satiated or satisfied; to be pleased with; jdn. satthaben
  • ātman - the breath; the soul; principle of life and sensation; the individual soul; self; abstract individual; essence; nature; character; peculiarity (often ifc); the person or whole body considered as one and opposed to the separate members of the body; the body; the highest personal principle of life; Brahma; effort; firmness; the sun; fire; a son

  • viji - 1.P.; vi; to conquer; to win or acquire by conquest; to vanquish; to defeat; to subdue; to overpower; to master; to control; to be victorious or superior; to contend victoriously with (instr.); to excel in (instr.); to be about to conquer; to go to victory
  • indriya - power; force; the quality which belongs especially to the mighty Indra; exhibition of power; powerful act; bodily power; power of the senses; virile power; semen virile; faculty of sense; sense; organ of sense; the number five as symbolical of the five senses

  • niyam - 1.P.; ni; to stop (trans.); to hold back; to detain with; to stop (intrans.); to stay; to remain; to keep back; to refuse; to fail; to be wanting; to fasten; to tie to; to bind up (hair etc.); to hold over; to extend; to hold downwards (the hand); to bring near; to procure; to bestow; to grant; to offer; to present (rain); to hold in; to keep down; to restrain; to control; to govern; to regulate (as breath); to suppress or conceal (one's nature); to destroy; to annihilate; to restrict; to fix upon; to settle; to determine; to establish; (in gram.) to lower; to pronounce low i.e. with the Anudātta
  • mānasa - _

  • nirvāṇa - blowing out; extinction; cessation; setting; vanishing; disappearance; extinction of the flame of life; dissolution; death or final emancipation from matter and re-union with the Supreme spirit.
  • parama - remotest; extreme; last; chief; highest; primary; most prominent or conspicuous; best; most excellent; worst; (with abl.) superior or inferior to; better or worse than
  • mad - I; we
  • saṃsthā - staying or abiding with; shape; form; manifestation; appearance; established order; standard; rule; direction; quality; property; nature; conclusion; termination; completion; end; death; destruction of the world; a complete liturgical course; the basis or essential form of a sacrifice; a basic form (of something; ifc.)

  • saṃjñita - made known; communicated; apprised by a sign or gesture; called; named; termed (generally ifc.)

  • īkṣ - to see; to look; to view; to behold; to look at; to gaze at; to watch over; to see in one's mind; to think; to have a thought; to regard; to consider; to observe (the stars etc.); to foretell for (dat)

  • yuj - to yoke or join or fasten or harness (horses or a chariot); to make ready; to prepare; to arrange; to fit out; to set to work; to use; to employ; to apply; to equip (an army); to offer; to perform (prayers); to put on (arrows on a bow-string); to fix in; to insert; to inject (semen); to appoint to; to charge or intrust with; to command; to enjoin; to turn or direct or fix or concentrate (the mind); to concentrate the mind in order to obtain union with the Universal spirit; to be absorbed in meditation; to recollect; to recall; to join; to unite; to connect; to add; to bring together; to confer; to bestow anything (acc.) upon (gen. or loc.); to become possessed of; to use for one's self; to bring into possession of; to furnish or endow with (instr.); to join one's self to (acc.); (in astron.) to come into union or conjunction with (acc.); to be yoked or harnessed or joined; to attach one's self to; to be made ready or prepared for (dat.); to be united in marriage; to be endowed with or possessed of (instr. wit
  • ātman - the breath; the soul; principle of life and sensation; the individual soul; self; abstract individual; essence; nature; character; peculiarity (often ifc); the person or whole body considered as one and opposed to the separate members of the body; the body; the highest personal principle of life; Brahma; effort; firmness; the sun; fire; a son
  • sarvatra - everywhere; in every case; always; at all times
  • sama - even; flat; level; parallel; same; similar; like; equivalent; fair; constant; ordinary; common; good; upright; easy; whole
  • darśana - seeing; observing; looking; noticing; observation; perception; ocular perception; the eye-sight; inspection; examination; visiting; audience; meeting

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 6.34.1

cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavaddṛḍham

STEM:cañcalahimanaskṛṣṇapramāthinbalavatdṛḍham
INFL:cañcalaṃhimanaḥkṛṣṇapramāthi__
GRAM:Nom|s|nNom|s|nVoc|s|mNom|s|nNom|s|n

VOCABULARY:

  • cañcala - moving to and fro; unsteady; flickering; inconstant; inconsiderate
  • hi - _
  • manas - mind (in its widest sense as applied to all the mental powers); intellect; intelligence; understanding; perception; sense; conscience; will (in phil. the internal organ or antaḥ-karaṇa of perception and cognition); the spirit or spiritual principle; the breath or living soul which escapes from the body at death (called asu in animals); thought; imagination; excogitation; invention; reflection; opinion; intention; inclination; affection; desire; mood; temper; spirit; name of the 26th Kalpa; name of the lake Mānasa
  • kṛṣṇa - the dark half of the lunar month from full to new moon; fourth or Kaliyuga; black; antelope; a kind of animal feeding on carrion; Indian cuckoo or Kokila; crow; name of a celebrated Avatār of god Viṣṇu; name of Vyāsa; name of Hārita; name of Havirdhāna; name of a son of Arjuna; name of an adopted son of Asamañjas; name of a chief of the Andhras; name of a poet; name of the father of Dāmodara and uncle of Malhaṇa; name of the father of Madana; name of the son of Vāruṇendra and father of Lakṣmaṇa; name of the father of Hīrabhaṭṭa; name of a hell; a kind of venomous frog (maṇḍūka); a kind of venomous insect; name of a mountain in the west of lake Mānasa; name of Śiva; name of Arjuna; name of a son of Śuka; name of a servant of Skanda; name of the Śūdras in Śālmaladvīpa
  • pramāthin - stirring about; tearing; rending; troubling; harassing; destroying; striking off; used for striking off; (in med.) throwing out i.e. producing secretion of the vessels
  • balavat - possessing power; powerful; mighty; strong; intense; vehement (as love); dense (as darkness); preponderating; prevailing; accompanied by an army
  • dṛḍham - intensively

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 6.34.2

  • vāyu - wind; air (as one of the 5 elements); the god of the wind; breathing; breath; the wind of the body; a vital air (of which 5 are reckoned); [medic.] = vāta; the wind as a kind of demon producing madness; (in astron.) name of the fourth Muhūrta; a mystical name of the letter ya; name of a Vasu; name of a Daitya; name of a king of the Gandharvas; name of a Marut; the Maruts; linkes Nasenloch
  • iva - like; in the same manner as (in this sense = yathā); as it were; as if; in a certain manner; in some measure; a little; perhaps (in qualification or mitigation of a strong assertion); nearly; almost; about; so; just so; just; exactly; indeed; very (especially after words which involve some restriction)
  • su - [ibc.] good-; [ibc.] very; quite; fein
  • duṣkara - hard to be done or borne; difficult; arduous; rare; extraordinary; doing wrong; behaving ill; wicked; bad

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 6.35.3

abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate

STEM:abhyāsatukaunteyavairāgyacagrah
INFL:abhyāsenatukaunteyavairāgyeṇacagṛhyate
GRAM:Ins|s|mVoc|s|mIns|s|nPass|3|s

VOCABULARY:

  • abhyāsa - the act of adding anything; (in Gr.) "what is prefixed"; the first syllable of a reduplicated radical; reduplication; repetition; (in poetry) repetition of the last verse of a stanza or of the last word of a chapter; (in arithm.) multiplication; repeated or permanent exercise; discipline; use; habit; custom; repeated reading; study; military practice; (in later Vedānta phil.) inculcation of a truth conveyed in sacred writings by means of repeating the same word or the same passage; (in Yoga phil.) the effort of the mind to remain in its unmodified condition of purity (sattva)
  • tu - do; now; then; but; and; or; name of the river Śatadru
  • kaunteya - metron. from Kuntī; name of Yudhiṣṭhira; Bhīmasena; Arjuna; the tree Terminalia Arjuna; the Pāṇḍavas
  • vairāgya - change or loss of colour; growing pale; disgust; aversion; distaste for or loathing of; freedom from all worldly desires; indifference to worldly objects and to life; asceticism
  • ca - and; both; also; moreover; as well as
  • grah - to seize; to take (by the hand); to grasp; to lay hold of; to arrest; to stop; to catch; to take captive; to take prisoner; to capture; to imprison; to take possession of; to gain over; to captivate; to overpower (esp. said of diseases and demons and the punishments of Varuṇa); to eclipse; to abstract; to take away (by robbery); to lay the hand on; to claim; to gain; to win; to obtain; to receive; to accept; to keep; to observe; to recognise; (in astron.) to observe; to receive into the mind; to apprehend; to understand; to learn; (in astron.) to calculate; to admit; to approve; to obey; to follow; to take for; to consider as; to perceive; to sense

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 6.36.1

asaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpa iti me matiḥ

VOCABULARY:

  • asaṃyata - not kept together; not shut (as a door); unbridled; recited inattentively; not suppressed
  • ātman - the breath; the soul; principle of life and sensation; the individual soul; self; abstract individual; essence; nature; character; peculiarity (often ifc); the person or whole body considered as one and opposed to the separate members of the body; the body; the highest personal principle of life; Brahma; effort; firmness; the sun; fire; a son
  • yoga - the act of yoking; joining; attaching; harnessing; putting to (of horses); a yoke; team; vehicle; conveyance; employment; use; application; performance; equipping or arraying (of an army); fixing (of an arrow on the bow-string); putting on (of armour); a remedy; cure; a means; expedient; device; way; manner; method; a supernatural means; charm; incantation; magical art; a trick; stratagem; fraud; deceit; undertaking; business; work; acquisition; gain; profit; wealth; property; occasion; opportunity; any junction; union; combination; contact with (instr. with or without saha); mixture; partaking of; possessing (instr. or comp.); connection; relation; putting together; arrangement; disposition; regular succession; fitting together; fitness; propriety; exertion; endeavour; zeal; diligence; industry; care; application or concentration of the thoughts; abstract contemplation; meditation; self-concentration; abstract meditation and mental abstraction practised as a system; any simple act or rite conducive to Yoga o
  • duṣprāpa - hard to attain; inaccessible; remote
  • iti - in this manner; thus (in its original signification iti refers to something that has been said or thought); so; [gramm.] the word iti
  • mad - I; we
  • mati - devotion; prayer; worship; hymn; sacred utterance; thought; design; intention; resolution; determination; inclination; wish; desire; notion; idea; belief; conviction; view; the mind; perception; understanding; intelligence; sense; judgment; esteem; respect; regard; memory; remembrance; Opinion personified (and identified with Subalātmajā as one of the mothers of the five sons of Pāṇḍu); a kind of vegetable or pot-herb

bhagavadgita_3 6.BhaGī 6.36.2

vaśyātmanā tu yatatā śakyo 'vāptumupāyataḥ

INFL:__tuyatatāśakyo__
GRAM:Comp.Ins|s|mIns|s|m|PresPartNom|s|mInf.Abl|s|m

VOCABULARY:

  • vaśya - to be subjected; subdued; tamed; humbled; being under control; obedient to another's will; dutiful; docile; tame; humble; at the disposal of (gen. or comp.)
  • ātman - the breath; the soul; principle of life and sensation; the individual soul; self; abstract individual; essence; nature; character; peculiarity (often ifc); the person or whole body considered as one and opposed to the separate members of the body; the body; the highest personal principle of life; Brahma; effort; firmness; the sun; fire; a son
  • tu - do; now; then; but; and; or; name of the river Śatadru
  • yat - to place in order; to marshal; to join; to connect; to keep pace; to be in line; to rival or vie with (instr.); to join (instr.); to associate with (instr.); to march or fly together or in line; to conform or comply with (instr.); to meet; to encounter (in battle); to seek to join one's self with; to make for; to tend towards; to endeavour to reach; to strive after; to be eager or anxious for; to align with
  • śakya - able; possible; practicable; capable of being
  • avāp - 5.P.; ava; to reach; to attain; to obtain; to gain; to get; to get by division (as a quotient); to suffer (e.g. blame or unpleasantness or pain)
  • upāya - coming near; approach; arrival; that by which one reaches one's aim; a means or expedient (of any kind); way; stratagem; craft; artifice; a means of success against an enemy (four are usually enumerated); joining in or accompanying (in singing)

  • saṃsiddhi - complete accomplishment or fulfilment; perfection; success; perfect state; beatitude; final emancipation; the Iast consequence or result; fixed or settled opinion; the last or decisive word
  • kuru - name of a people of India and of their country (situated near the country of the Pañcālas); = ṛtvijas (priests); = kartāras ("doers"); name of the ancestor of the Kurus; son of Saṃvaraṇa and Tapatī; name of a son of Āgnīdhra; boiled rice; the plant Solanum Jacquini; [medic.] a class of worms
  • nandana - a son; a frog; a kind of poisonous plant; a particular form of temple; (in music) a kind of measure; name of Viṣṇu or Śiva; name of an attendant of Skanda; name of the 26th year in a Jupiter cycle of 60 years

  • mad - I; we
  • bhid - to split; to cleave; to break; to cut or rend asunder; to pierce; to destroy; to pass through (as a planet); to disperse (darkness); to transgress; to violate; to open; to expand; to loosen; to disentangle; to dissolve; to disturb; to interrupt; to stop; to disclose; to betray; to disunite; to set at variance; to distinguish; to discriminate; to be split or broken; to burst (intrans.); to be opened (as a closed hand); to overflow (as water); to be loosened; to become loose; to be stopped or interrupted; to be disclosed or betrayed; to be changed or altered (in mind); to be won over; to be disunited; to keep aloof from (instr.); to be distinguished; to differ from (abl.)
  • prakṛti - the original or natural form or condition of anything; original or primary substance (opp. to vi-kṛti); cause; origin; extraction; nature; character; constitution; temper; disposition; fundamental form; pattern; standard; model; rule (esp. in ritual); (in the Sāṃkhya phil.) the original producer of (or rather passive power of creating) the material world; Nature (distinguished from puruṣa); the 8 producers or primary essences which evolve the whole visible world; (in mythol.) a goddess; the personified will of the Supreme in the creation; (pl.) name of a class of deities under Manu Raibhya; (in polit.) a king's ministers; the body of ministers or counsellors; ministry; the subjects of a king; citizens; artisans; the constituent elements or powers of the state; the various sovereigns to be considered in case of war; territory; (in gram.) the crude or elementary form of a word; base; root; an uninflected word; name of 2 classes of metres; (in arithm.) a co-efficient multiplier; (in anat.) temperament; th
  • aṣṭadhā - eight-fold; in eight parts or sections

  • kāma - _
  • as - to be; to live; to exist; to be present; to take place; to happen; to abide; to dwell; to stay; to belong to (gen. or dat.); to fall to the share of; to be equal to (dat.); to turn out; to tend towards any result; to prove
  • bharata - name of Agni (kept alive by the care of men); name of a particular Agni (father of Bharata and Bharatī); a priest; an actor; dancer; tumbler; a weaver; a hireling; mercenary; a barbarian; mountaineer; the fire in which the rice for Brāhmans is boiled; name of Rudra; name of an Āditya; name of a son of Agni Bharata; name of a celebrated hero and monarch of India (son of Duṣyanta); name of a son of Dhruvasaṃdhi and father of Asita; name of a son of Ṛṣabha; Bur; name of a son of Vītihotra; name of a Manu (who gave the name to the country Bhārata); name of a son of Manu Bhautya; name of a king of Aśmaka; name of various teachers and authors (esp. of an ancient Muni supposed author of a manual of the dramatic art called Nāṭyaśāstra or Bharata-śāstra); = Bharatamallīka; name of a tribe; (archery)
  • ṛṣabha - _
